infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SecureLinQ needs access to your camera to take photos and record videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SecureLinQ needs access to your microphone to record videos with audio.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SecureLinQ needs access to your photo library to save captured media.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SecureLinQ to access your camera to take photos and record videos.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow SecureLinQ to access your microphone to record videos with audio.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow SecureLinQ to access your photos to save captured media.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow SecureLinQ to save photos and videos to your device.
